history.proof: intros d a la ls hd tl r H. hfcrush depth: 3.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl r H.
exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "d", "la" and "tl" leads to a term fun (d0 : preDTA) (la0 : prec_list) (tl0 : term_list) => forall r0 : reconnaissance d0 a hd, predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_0 d0 a hd r0 -> predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_2 d0 la0 tl0 l -> predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_2 d0 (prec_cons a la0 ls) (tcons hd tl0) (rec_consi d0 a la0 ls hd tl0 r0 l) which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_2" of type "forall (p : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (lt : term_list), liste_reconnait p pl lt -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "d0" : "preDTA" "la0" : "prec_list" "tl0" : "term_list" "l" : "liste_reconnait d la tl" The 4th term has type "liste_reconnait d la tl" which should be coercible to "liste_reconnait d0 la0 tl0".

original: intros d a la ls hd tl r H. induction l using liste_reconnait_ind. - exfalso. apply (sem_listes_1 d hd tl). auto. - intros H0. apply semantic_equiv_1_3. + apply H. + apply H0. + auto. - intros H0. apply semantic_equiv_1_4. + apply H0. + auto.
